spatial_accuracy.notes: Major wall alignment failures. The kitchen island orientation is incorrect (90-degree rotation). The staircase has been replaced with a vague hallway/storage area. Window placement is completely inconsistent with the 2D layout.

structural_fidelity.notes: The staircase is entirely missing (E1). The entrance door and hallway configuration are structurally distorted. Several interior walls are missing or rendered as curved/detached segments, failing to create sealed rooms.

furniture_mapping.notes: The bed shape is hallucinated as a hexagon (E5). The dining table scale is small, and the sofa in the living area is improperly aligned with the window walls.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good lighting and soft shadows. The isometric perspective is generally correct, but 'melted' geometry at wall junctions (E6) and non-orthographic wall thicknesses significantly detract from the technical quality.

detected_errors.description: Entire staircase at the right-wing of the plan is missing/replaced with a corridor.
Kitchen island is rotated incorrectly and lacks the sink/counter integration shown in the plan.
Bedroom dimensions and dining area proportions are significantly distorted compared to the master plan.
Hallucinated hexagonal bed frame and curved wall segments not present in the original 2D architectural drawing.
Incomplete wall junctions and floating geometry near the bathroom and entrance area.
